item.title: How to Access Test Only Files From Unit and Instrumented Test Packages
item.description: TL;DR Create a directory called testCommon and add the code below to your build.gradle file. android { ... sourceSets { test { java.srcDirs += src/testCommon } androidTest { java.srcDirs += src/testCommon } } } Have you ever been in a situation where you need to access util files from both test and androidTest packages? If so, this article may be useful for you. Let’s say that you have a file called Placeholders.
